con:soapui-project.name: PatientDiscoveryDB

con:testSuite.name: PD_DB
con:testSuite.con:description: Tests the patientdb functionality. Patient information can be looked up by the adapter in either mpi.xml or in the database. The option is controlled by the bean mpichecker in the file AdapterMpiConfig.xml.

con:request.name: Patient Discovery

con:config.script:
log.info "Assert ${pdCorrelations} number of correlations"
context.withSql('PatientCorrelationDB') { sql -> assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('PatientCorrelationTable'))[0] }
